data.heading: Inflation Indigestion: How Much Will a Thanksgiving Feast Run You in 2021?
data.intro: Annual survey from American Farm Bureau says average cost for the holiday meal up 14% from last year.

data.intro: Ambitious industry program calls for at least some growers to make big changes in harvest practices.

data.intro: Inversion unveiled as attaching a 30-foot mast to a weather station helps define ideal spray time.

data.heading: North Carolina Growers on High Alert for Spotted Lanternfly Invasion
data.intro: An established sect of the pest was spotted just 20 miles from the North Carolina border. This is the closest infestation to the Tar Heel State to date.

data.intro: To help keep pests and diseases at bay, organic growers can place bags around individual fruit, researchers say.
